accessories.name: 2-Speed Immersion Blender + Whisk Attachment
accessories.description: This easy-to-assemble hand-held blender offers Vitamix performance, two-speed control, a protective bell guard to prevent scratches, and whisk attachment – all at an affordable price. It's covered by a two-year full warranty, so you'll be creating healthy, delicious dishes for years to come.
features: Blends in containers with 3-inch wide opening

accessories.name: 20-ounce Travel Cup
accessories.description: Blend and go with the Vitamix 20-ounce Travel Cup. This BPA-free cup is compatible with all S-Series Vitamix blenders.

accessories.name: 24-ounce Tumbler
accessories.description: Keep beverages cold with these stylish stainless-steel tumblers. Double-wall insulated mug comes with a lid and straw. Add ice and keep beverages cold for up to 18 hours.
features: Keeps beverages cold for up to 18 hours

accessories.name: 32-ounce Container
accessories.description: The 32-ounce container is lightweight, durable, and perfect for processing small quantities of smoothies, soups, and frozen desserts
features: Fits easily under most kitchen cabinets
Blades create simultaneous slicing and pulverizing action

accessories.name: 32-ounce Dry Grains Container
accessories.description: The 32-ounce Dry Grains container grinds whole grains into fresh flours, mixes batter, and even simulates the kneading process to prepare dough for baking
features: Specially designed blades for grinding whole grains
Reverse vortex blade design prevents ingredient packing
Clearly marked measurements on container and lid

machines: All full-size Classic C- or G-Series Vitamix blenders

accessories.name: 5-Speed Immersion Blender 4-Piece Deluxe Bundle
accessories.description: The Immersion Blender delivers performance you can trust. Create ideal textures from whole-food ingredients like greens and frozen fruit, and enjoy the convenience of blending in your favorite container.
features: Blend in any container with 3-inch wide opening

accessories.name: 48-ounce Color Container with SELF-DETECT®
accessories.description: The Vitamix Color Container is perfect for color-coded uses, like allergen-sensitive cooking and non-food blending. Feel confident avoiding cross-contamination in the kitchen, blending non-food recipes like pet food or body scrubs, or simply making your kitchen a more beautiful place to be.

accessories.name: 48-ounce Container
accessories.description: The 48-ounce container strikes a perfect balance between processing adequate quantities and fitting easily under most kitchen cabinets
features: Designed to process medium batches with a lightweight design
Uniquely controlled vortex for faster, smoother blends
Vented lid and lid plug for hot serving temperatures
Ideal for blending medium batches for small family meals

accessories.name: 48-ounce Container with SELF-DETECT®
accessories.description: This container is designed to make small to medium batches of your favorite smoothies, soups, frozen desserts, and more—helping to avoid food waste. Its petite size fits easily below overhead cabinets, and clean-up is a breeze since it's both self-cleaning and dishwasher-safe.

accessories.name: 48-ounce Dry Grains Container with SELF-DETECT®
accessories.description: This container is specially designed to efficiently grind fresh, whole-grain and gluten-free flour, mix batter, and knead thick yeast dough for pizza, soft pretzels, and homemade bread.

accessories.name: 48-ounce Stainless Steel Container
accessories.description: Stainless steel cookware is a staple in both home and professional kitchens, and for good reason. It's incredibly durable, versatile, and easy to clean – all qualities Vitamix® owners value in a blending container. And, since it comes with a clear, BPA-free lid, you can monitor and adjust blends without stopping the machine.
features: Durable cookware material preferred by professionals
Non-reactive for hot, cold, and acidic blends

accessories.name: 5-Speed Immersion Blender
accessories.description: The Immersion Blender delivers performance you can trust. Create ideal textures from whole-food ingredients like greens and frozen fruit, and enjoy the convenience of blending in your favorite container.
features: Blend in any container with 3-inch wide opening

specs.material: Motor housing: stainless wrap over plastic; Wand: stainless with plastic coating

accessories.name: 5-Speed Immersion Blender 3-Piece Bundle
accessories.description: Create ideal textures from whole-food ingredients and enjoy the convenience of blending in your favorite container with the 5-speed Immersion Blender 3-Piece Bundle.
features: Blend in any container with 3-inch wide opening

accessories.name: 64-ounce Low-Profile Container with SELF-DETECT®
accessories.description: Newly designed Low Profile 64 oz container fits easily under the most kitchen cabinet while proccess larger batches of meal for your family

accessories.name: 8 Piece Straw Set
accessories.description: You'll never miss a sip with these silicone-tipped, stainless-steel smoothie straws. The pack of six is perfect for the whole family, plus the two cleaning brushes, making reusing a breeze. Always BPA-free and dishwasher safe, these straws are a sustainable way to enjoy smoothies and juices.

specs.material: Food Grade Stainless Steel (18/8), Food Grade Silicone, Nylon bristles

includedItems: 8 piece straw set with 2 cleaner straws on a blister card

accessories.name: Classic 64-ounce Container
accessories.description: Designed to efficiently rotate large quantities back to the blade, the 64-ounce container is the ideal size for family meals and entertaining.
features: Tidy Blends with uniquely controlled vortex
Vented lid for hot serving temperatures

accessories.name: Cutting Board 4-Piece Set
accessories.description: These versatile cutting boards let you slice, dice and chop food, then funnel it right into your Vitamix machine, bowl or pan. With one smooth operation and fewer accessories to clean, food preperation is quicker and easier than ever. This set of four dishwasher-safe plastic boards is coded for food type to help prevent cross-contamination. Perfect for slicing, dicing, and more, they are designed to withstand years of normal household use.
features: Funnels food into Vitamix machine, bowl or pan
Coded for food type to prevent cross-contamination
Designed for years of household use

accessories.name: 12-Cup Food Processor Attachment with SELF-DETECT®
accessories.description: Combine the power of your Vitamix motor base with the precision of a large-capacity, full-feature food processor. Go beyond blending and discover how easy food prep can be.
features: Multi-Use Blade for chopping, mincing, kneading, and mixing
Reversible Small and Large Shred/Slice Discs

specs.material: Tritan work bowl and lid, ABS & Polycarbonate blend base

accessories.name: 12-Cup Food Processor Attachment with SELF-DETECT® Bundle
accessories.description: Combine the power of your Vitamix motor base with the precision of a large-capacity, full-feature food processor, plus enjoy the added versatility from three bonus cutting discs.

specs.material: Tritan work bowl and lid, ABS & Polycarbonate blend base

includedItems: Reversible Thin Slice/ Fine Shred Slice
Reversible Small Shred/ Thin Slice Disc
Reversible Large Shred/ Thick Slice Disc

accessories.name: Food Processor Attachment Julienne Disc
accessories.description: Let the Food Processor Attachment handle this tedious food-prep staple. The large food chute allows you to insert ingredients oriented horizontally, so you can get long, thin julienne cuts from carrots, zucchini, beets, and more. Get precise, matchstick cuts faster, easier, and safer – no knife skills needed.

accessories.name: Food Processor Attachment Stack and Store Extender
accessories.description: Organize your collection of Food Processor Attachment discs with the Stack and Store Extender. It's a compact storage solution that increases the capacity of the standard storage case and allows you to store up to 3 additional discs.
features: Increases capacity of standard storage case

accessories.name: Food Processor Attachment Veggie Stick Disc
accessories.description: Homemade fries have never been easier. This disc slices perfectly shaped veggie sticks in seconds. Plus, when you make them at home, you can try healthier preparation methods; try making your own baked French fries out of potatoes, sweet potatoes, or other root veggies. They're sure to become a family favorite.
features: Ideal for making baked fries from various root vegetables

accessories.name: Food Processor Attachment Reversible Fine Shred and Ultra-Thin Slice Disc
accessories.description: Take your Food Processor Attachment precision to the next level. This reversible disc will slice and shred ingredients finer and thinner than the standard discs included with the product. It's perfect for shredded salad toppings, thin-sliced veggie chips, pizza toppings, and much more.
features: Reversible disc for fine shredding and ultra-thin slicing

accessories.name: Food Processor Attachment Compact Lid
accessories.description: This streamlined lid makes the Food Processor attachment more compact and easier to fit into and under cabinets. It works just like the standard lid, but doesn't have a chute or food pushers. If you're primarily using the multi-use blade, this is a great way to reduce the number of pieces you have to keep track of and clean. This lid also turns the work bowl into a storage container, which can then fit easily into the refrigerator.
features: Can be used as storage container

accessories.name: Vitamix® FoodCycler® FC-50™
accessories.description: The FoodCycler FC-50 is a compact food waste recycler that reduces food waste by up to 90% and eliminates odors, making it ideal for indoor use.
features: Reduces food waste to a fraction of original volume
includedItems: Removable Waste Bucket with Carbon Filter Lid

accessories.name: Immersion Blender Storage Case
accessories.description: Cut down on kitchen clutter with the Immersion Blender Storage Case. This soft-sided travel case to keeps your Immersion Blender neatly organized in your kitchen cabinet, so it's always easy to find. Or, if you're planning on cooking away from home, the Storage Case makes it easy to take your Immersion Blender with you.

accessories.name: Immersion Blender Whisk
accessories.description: Give your forearm a break and take your Vitamix Immersion Blender for a spin. This attachment turns your Immersion blender in a powerful whisk, allowing you to whip aquafaba, batters, meringues, eggs, cream, and more in minutes.
features: Turns Immersion Blender into a powerful whisk
Works for small to large batches

accessories.name: Immersion Blending Jar
accessories.description: The Immersion Blending Jar design was inspired the standard Vitamix container. The unique shape efficiently moves ingredients through the blades, for a consistent, high-quality blend quality every time. It's easy to blend right in the 32-ounce jar, then take it on the go, or store in the fridge for later. Plus, the mouth of the jar is compatible with standard, wide-mouth canning jar lids.
features: Inspired by standard Vitamix container design
Compatible with standard wide-mouth canning jar lids

accessories.name: Immersion Station®
accessories.description: Keep your Immersion Blender and accessories organized, secure, and close at hand. The Immersion Station is a simple, convenient countertop display that keeps the Immersion blender in one place. Perfect for frequent users of the Immersion Blender, or for kitchens with limited cabinet space.
features: Suitable for kitchens with limited cabinet space

accessories.name: Low-Profile 64-ounce Container
accessories.description: Designed to process large batches with a lightweight design that fits easily under most kitchen cabinets.
features: Laser-cut stainless-steel hammermill and cutting blades

accessories.name: Personal Cup Adapter
accessories.description: Add the convenience of a personal blender to your full-size Vitamix® machine. The individual portion size of the 20-ounce cup lets you blend just the right amount and avoid food waste.

specs.material: Cups (Tritan), Storage Lid (Polypropylene), Blade Base (delrene), Blade (Stainless Steel)

accessories.name: Silicone Blender Spatula
accessories.description: This ergonomic spatula is dishwasher safe and designed to get every last bit out of the container, even when blending thicker recipes like nut butter or frozen dessert. Plus, the vibrant red adds a pop of color to any kitchen.
features: Gets every last bit from container

specs.material: Food Grade Silicone over molded iron

accessories.name: Simply Entertaining Cookbook
accessories.description: Add to your Simply Blending collection. The Simply Entertaining book offers complete seasonal menus with appetizers, entrées, sides, beverages, and desserts, designed to help you throw a memorable soirée at any time of year.
features: Six-course meal for four to six guests
Recipes can be easily doubled or tripled
Tips from Vitamix® chefs on recipe adjustments and preparation

accessories.name: Simply Soups Cookbook
accessories.description: Try more than 35 delicious, whole-food soup recipes, plus recipes for sides, garnishes, and seasonings – all designed to make food prep easier and mealtime tastier. The book features sections like Chefs' Tips for Superior Soups, Raw & Superfood Soups, Warm-Weather Soups, Cold-Weather Weather Soups, Soup Sides, Garnishes & Spice Blends, and much more.
features: Sections on chefs' tips, raw soups, warm and cold weather soups

machines: All Vitamix® machines except the Vitamix ONE

accessories.name: Under Blade Scraper
accessories.description: The Blade Scraper allows you to get the most out of every recipe by reaching hard to access points in your container, like under the blade. Designed for use with all Vitamix containers.
features: Reaches hard to access points in container
Designed for use with all Vitamix containers

accessories.name: Whole Grains Cookbook
accessories.description: Developed by Vitamix chefs, this cookbook is invaluable for grinding fresh flour from whole grains or making homemade breads and cereals.
features: Grinding fresh flour from whole grains
